header_text: You are at the airport rushing to catch a plane. You feel your heart racing as you step on the plan and sit down. Starting to sweat and breathe quickly, you fear that you might have a panic attack.

elements.text: You have a strong urge to get off the plane and go back home, but you sit down at the nearest seat. Instead of exiting, you decide to observe these sensations and stay...

elements.name: You are at the airport rushing to catch a plane. You feel your heart racing as you step on the plan and sit down. Starting to sweat and breathe quickly, you fear that you might have a panic attack._Physical Health_puzzle_word2
